calc::Lookup< data_type > Class Template Reference

Documentation

template<typename data_type>
class calc::Lookup< data_type >

This class is for implementing lookup tables using linear extrapolation.

Public Member Functions

data_type calc_value (data_type x)
 
 Lookup (const data_type *table, int size)
 

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename data_type >
calc::Lookup< data_type >::Lookup ( const data_type *  table,
int  size 
)
inline

Construct a lookup table object.

Parameters
tableA pointer to a table with x and y values alternating, x values must be in ascending order
sizeThe number of x,y entries in the table

This calculates the y value using linear extrapolation.

y value using linear extrapolation
